title: Pathaan trailer release live updates: Trailer crosses 1mn views in 19 mins
description: Pathaan trailer release live updates: Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone and John Abraham will launch the first trailer for Pathaan on Tuesday.

title: RRR Star Jr NTR Mobbed By Fans At Los Angeles Theatre Ahead Of Golden Globes
description: Jr NTR is in Los Angeles for the Golden Globe Awards

title: Javed Akhtar on Pathaan row: We have 4-5 dharmas, they should have their censors
description: Javed Akhtar has said if a minister is unhappy with the Centre's film certification, we should not come in between them, it is between them and the Centre.

title: Watch: Kate Winslet Pauses Interview To Reassure Nervous Journalist
description: Actor Kate Winslet won many hearts after a video of her motivating a first-time interviewer during the 'Avatar: The Way of Water' promotions went viral.

title: ‘No matter how many struggles I face in life…’: Samantha Ruth Prabhu breaks down at 'Shaakuntalam' trailer launch event - Times of India
description: Actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu, who is currently recovering from Myositis, recently got emotional while attending the trailer launch event of her upcoming movie 'Shaakuntalam'.

title: OMG! Janhvi Kapoor gets 'uncomfortable' while posing with a male fan
description: Janhvi Kapoor looked highly uncomfortable as male fans came close to her comfort to click pictures with her. The 'Mili' actress won hearts with her gesture that despite being uncomfortable she posed with everyone and later moved towards her car.

title: Phenomenal: Rajamouli becomes the first Indian director to grace this famous show - 123telugu
description: SS Rajamouli made not only Tollywood but also the Indian film industry by making the magnum opus RRR which turned out to be a global blockbuster.

title: RRR Will Win Oscar for Best Film, Declares Hollywood Producer Jason Blum
description: Film producer Jason Blum, the founder of Blumhouse Productions, which specialises in making horror movies, has predicted that RRR will Oscar for Best Picture.

title: Avatar: The Way Of Water Box Office Day 25 (Early Trends): On The Verge Of Crossing Avengers: Endgame, Celebrations Are Still On!
description: James Cameron's film Avatar: The Way Of Water is achieving the impossible with its remarkable feat at the ticket window.

title: Old pics of SRK and Angelina Jolie sharing stage at an award function go viral
description: Shah Rukh Khan and Angelina Jolie shared the stage at the first IIFA Awards held in London in 2000.

title: Veera Simha Reddy: Mass Mogudu is a perfect peppy number
description: Nandamuri Balakrishna and Shruti Haasan starrer Veera Simha Reddy is slated for a grand release worldwide on January 12, 2023. Gopichand Malineni is the helmer of the movie.

title: Oscars: 301 Feature Films Deemed Eligible for Nominations
description: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announced Monday that 301 feature films are eligible for the 95th Oscars, which includes presumed contenders such as 'Elvis' and 'The Fabelmans'.

title: Actor Tunisha Sharma Spoke To Man On Dating App Before Death: Sheezan Khan
description: Television actor Tunisha Sharma was in contact with a man named Ali on a dating app and was in his company between December 21 and 23, just before her death, lawyers of her co-star Sheezan Khan said.
